Name: Sanders
Review Text: Service was good. The lunch time menu... I got exactly what it said on the menu, but I'm not sure if croquettes should go in between two plain slices of bread. I thought there would be more to it. It's probably just my preference, but I didn't like it very much sorry! The greasy burger looked better.

Name: Sanders
Review Text: Decent food and great location by the bridge, however the service was very slow even there were less than 5 tables, staff was not very attentive.

Name: Sanders
Review Text: Food was okay. I got the steak and ordered medium but came out rare. The atmosphere of the restaurant was very nice, as you can look out to the canal.

Name: Sanders
Review Text: Good food, nice cozy atmosphere. Good drinks. Not a bad idea for after work chill.

Name: Sanders
Review Text: Very cheap and very good meal. I very recommend this place!

Name: Sanders
Review Text: the cocktails (espresso martini & white russian) are good. the food is super disgusting. we had the nachos and the fried platter. nachos had dried (old?) cheese on it and the fried platter was actually just fried balls with something in it â€¦

Name: Sanders
Review Text: Never again! Great music and food selection but sanitation is a deal breaker! The staff allowed a guy to bring in his dog (a golden retriever) who proceeded to roam unattended and scratch fleas in an eating establishment. PASS.
